newsitem.title: JAPAN: Mitsubishi Trust denies derivatives rumour.
newsitem.headline: Mitsubishi Trust denies derivatives rumour.

text.p: Mitsubishi Trust & Banking Corp denied market rumours on Monday that it had suffered a loss on derivatives trading.
"We have found no evidence of this," a spokesman for the bank said.
Vague rumours circulated in the Japanese government bond market on Monday that Mitsubishi Trust may be suffering losses from derivatives trading, traders said.

The bank's shares fell on Monday, partly depressed by a downward revision of its earnings forecast late last week, brokers said. The shares closed down 150 yen at 1,100 yen on heavy turnover of 2.39 million shares.
On Friday, Mitsubishi Trust said it expected to make a parent current profit for the year to March 31 of 130 billion yen, down from a previous estimate of 150 billion.
